ayas.text: ḥā mīm
'ain sīn qāf
kadhālika yūḥī ilayka wa ilal ladhīna min qablikallāhul `azīzul ḥakīm
lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۖ wahuwal `aliyyul `aẓīm
takādus samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min fawqihinn ۚ wal malā-ikatu yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim wayastaghfirūna liman fil-arḍ ۗ alā innallāha huwal ghafūrur raḥīm
wal ladhīnat-takhadhū min dūnihi awliyā-allāhu ḥafīẓun `alayhim wa mā anta `alayhim biwakīl
wakadhālika awḥaynā ilayka qur-ānan `arabiyyal litundhira ummal qurā wa man ḥawlahā watundhira yawmal jam`i lā rayba fīh ۚ farīqun fil jannati wafarīqun fis sa`īr
walaw shā-allāhu laja`alahum ummatan wāḥidatan walākin yudkhilu man yashā-u fī raḥmatih ۚ waẓ ẓālimūna mā lahum min waliyyin walā naṣīr
amit-takhadhū min dūnihi awliyā-a ۖ fallāhu huwal waliyyu wahuwa yuḥyil mawtā wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr
wa makh-talaftum fīhi min shay-in faḥukmuhu ilallāh ۚ dhālikumullāhu rabbī `alayhi tawakkaltu wa ilayhi unīb
fāṭirus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ ja`ala lakum min anfusikum azwājan wa minal-an`āmi azwājā ۖ yadhra-ukum fīh ۚ laysa kamithlihi shay-u ۖ wahuwas samī`ul baṣīr
lahu maqālīdus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ yabsuṭur rizqa liman yashā-u wayaqdir ۚ innahu bikulli shay-in `alīm

shara`a lakum minad dīni mā waṣṣā bihi nūḥan wal ladhī awḥaynā ilayka wa mā waṣṣaynā bihi ibrāhīma wa mūsā wa`īsā ۖ an aqīmud dīna walā tatafarraqū fīh ۚ kabura `alal-mushrikīna mā tad`ūhum ilayh ۚ allāhu yajtabī ilayhi man yashā-u wayahdī ilayhi man yunīb

wa mā tafarraqū illā min ba`di mā jā-ahumul `il-mu baghyan baynahum ۚ walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika ilā ajalin musamman laquḍiya baynahum ۚ wa innal ladhīna ūrithul kitāba min ba`dihim lafī shakkin minhu murīb

falidhālika fad` ۖ wastaqim kamā umirt ۖ walā tattabi` ahwā-ahum ۖ waqul āmantu bimā anzalallāhu min kitāb ۖ wa-umirtu li-a`dila baynakum ۖ allāhu rabbunā warabbukum ۖ lanā a`mālunā walakum a`mālukum ۖ lā ḥujjata baynanā wabaynakum ۖ allāhu yajma`u baynanā ۖ wa ilayhil maṣīr
wal ladhīna yuḥājjūna fillāhi min ba`di mas-tujība lahu ḥujjatuhum dāḥiḍatun `inda rabbihim wa`alayhim ghaḍabun walahum `adhābun shadīd
allāhul ladhī anzalal-kitāba bil ḥaqqi wal mīzān ۗ wa mā yudrīka la`allas sā`ata qarīb
yasta`jilu bihal ladhīna lā yu-minūna bihā ۖ wal ladhīna āmanū mushfiqūna minhā waya`lamūna annahal ḥaqq ۗ alā innal ladhīna yumārūna fis sā`ati lafī ḍalālin ba`īd
allāhu laṭīfun bi`ibādihi yarzuqu man yashā-u ۖ wahuwal qawiyyul `azīz
man kāna yurīdu ḥarthal-ākhirati nazid lahu fī ḥarthih ۖ wa man kāna yurīdu ḥarthad dunyā nu-tihi minhā wa mā lahu fil-ākhirati min naṣīb
am lahum shurakā-u shara`ū lahum minad dīni mā lam ya-dhan bihillāh ۚ walawlā kalimatul faṣli laquḍiya baynahum ۗ wa innaẓ ẓālimīna lahum `adhābun alīm
taraẓ ẓālimīna mushfiqīna mimmā kasabū wahuwa wāqi`un bihim ۗ wal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti fī rawḍātil jannāt ۖ lahum mā yashā-ūna `inda rabbihim ۚ dhālika huwal faḍlul kabīr

dhālikal ladhī yubashhirullāhu `ibādahul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāt ۗ qul lā as-alukum `alayhi ajran illal-mawaddata fil qurbā ۗ wa man yaqtarif ḥasanatan nazid lahu fīhā ḥusnā ۚ innallāha ghafūrun shakūr
am yaqūlūnaf-tarā `alallāhi kadhibā ۖ fa-in yasha-illāhu yakhtim `alā qalbik ۗ wayamḥullāhul bāṭila wayuḥiqqul ḥaqqa bikalimātih ۚ innahu `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr
wahuwal ladhī yaqbalut tawbata `an `ibādihi waya`fū `anis sayyi-āti waya`lamu mā taf`alūn
wayastajībul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti wayazīduhum min faḍlih ۚ wal kāfirūna lahum `adhābun shadīd
walaw basaṭallāhur rizqa li`ibādihi labaghaw fil-arḍi walākin yunazzilu biqadarin mā yashā-u ۚ innahu bi`ibādihi khabīrun baṣīr
wahuwal ladhī yunazzilul ghaytha min ba`di mā qanaṭū wayanshuru raḥmatah ۚ wahuwal waliyyul ḥamīd
wa min āyātihi khalqus samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bathha fīhimā min dābbah ۚ wahuwa `alā jam`ihim idhā yashā-u qadīr
wa mā aṣābakum min muṣībatin fabimā kasabat aydīkum waya`fū `an kathīr
wa mā antum bimu`jizīna fil-arḍ ۖ wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi min waliyyin walā naṣīr
wa min āyātihil jawāri fil baḥri kal-a`lām
in yasha-yuskinir rīḥa fayaẓlalna rawākida `alā ẓahrih ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūr
aw yūbiqhunna bimā kasabū waya`fu `an kathīr
waya`lamal ladhīna yujādilūna fī āyātinā mā lahum min maḥīṣ
famā ūtītum min shay-in famatā`ul ḥayātid dunyā ۖ wa mā `indallāhi khayrun wa-abqā lilladhīna āmanū wa`alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn
wal ladhīna yajtanibūna kabā-iral-ithmi wal fawāḥisha wa idhā mā ghaḍibū hum yaghfirūn
wal ladhīnas-tajābū lirabbihim wa-aqāmuṣ ṣalāta wa-amruhum shūrā baynahum wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn
wal ladhīna idhā aṣābahumul baghyu hum yantaṣirūn
wajazā-u sayyi-atin sayyi-atun mithluhā ۖ faman `afā wa-aṣlaḥa fa-ajruhu `alallāh ۚ innahu lā yuḥibbuẓ ẓālimīn
walamanin-taṣara ba`da ẓul-mihi fa-ulā-ika mā `alayhim min sabīl
innamas sabīlu `alal ladhīna yaẓlimūnan nāsa wayabghūna fil-arḍi bighayril ḥaqq ۚ ulā-ika lahum `adhābun alīm
walaman ṣabara waghafara inna dhālika lamin `azmil-umūr
wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min waliyyin min ba`dih ۗ wataraẓ ẓālimīna lammā ra-awul `adhāba yaqūlūna hal ilā maraddin min sabīl

watarāhum yu`raḍūna `alayhā khāshi`īna minadh dhulli yanẓurūna min ṭarfin khafiyy ۗ waqālal ladhīna āmanū innal khāsirīnal ladhīna khasirū anfusahum wa-ahlīhim yawmal qiyāmah ۗ alā innaẓ ẓālimīna fī `adhābin muqīm
wa mā kāna lahum min awliyā-a yanṣurūnahum min dūnillāh ۗ wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min sabīl
is-tajībū lirabbikum min qabli an ya-tiya yawmul lā maradda lahu minallāh ۚ mā lakum min malja-in yawma-idhin wa mā lakum min nakīr
fa-in a`raḍū famā arsalnāka `alayhim ḥafīẓā ۖ in `alayka illal-balāgh ۗ wa innā idhā adhaqnal-insāna minnā raḥmatan fariḥa bihā ۖ wa in tuṣibhum sayyi-atun bimā qaddamat aydīhim fa-innal-insāna kafūr
lillāhi mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ yakhluqu mā yashā-u ۚ yahabu liman yashā-u ināthan wayahabu liman yashā-udh dhukūr
aw yuzawwijuhum dhukrānan wa ināthā ۖ wayaj`alu man yashā-u `aqīmā ۚ innahu `alīmun qadīr
wa mā kāna libasharin an yukallimahullāhu illā waḥyan aw min warā-i ḥijābin aw yursila rasūlan fayūḥiya bi-idhnihi mā yashā-u ۚ innahu `aliyyun ḥakīm
wakadhālika awḥaynā ilayka rūḥan min amrinā ۚ mā kunta tadrī mal kitābu walal-iymānu walākin ja`alnāhu nūran nahdī bihi man nashā-u min `ibādinā ۚ wa innaka latahdī ilā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm
ṣirāṭillāhil ladhī lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۗ alā ilallāhi taṣīrul-umūr
